msg: Bug fix in libprocess relating to 'pause'.

author: benh
msg: Updating tests to use 'num_slaves' option instead of 'slaves'.

author: benh
msg: Added a "SlavesManager" to help coordinate which slaves are an active part of a Mesos cluster. This includes ZooKeeper support for when using ZooKeeper as the persistant backing store of active slaves.

author: benh
msg: Improvements and minor bug fixes in libprocess.
